name: Immortal Disfigurement
description: '''Immortal Disfigurement''' is an American [[deathcore]] band, formed in 2022 by vocalist CJ McCreery and guitarist Josh Freeman. The band is known as part of the [[symphonic deathcore]] scene. The group currently consists of CJ McCreery on vocals, Josh Freeman and Jacob Toy on guitars, Shane Slade on bass and Suki on drums.
